argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | odmulgid.1 | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | odmulgid.2 | |- O = ( od ` G ) |
| 3 |  | odmulgid.3 | |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpl1 | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> K e. ZZ ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpl3 | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpl2 | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> A e. X ) |
| 8 | 1, 3 | #P_mulgass | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( K e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ /\ A e. X ) ) -> ( ( K x. N ) .x. A ) = ( K .x. ( N .x. A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_syl13anc | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( K x. N ) .x. A ) = ( K .x. ( N .x. A ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( K x. N ) .x. A ) = ( 0g ` G ) <-> ( K .x. ( N .x. A ) ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 6 | #P_zmulcld | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( K x. N ) e. ZZ ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 12 | #P_oddvds | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ ( K x. N ) e. ZZ ) -> ( ( O ` A ) || ( K x. N ) <-> ( ( K x. N ) .x. A ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 7, 11, 13 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( O ` A ) || ( K x. N ) <-> ( ( K x. N ) .x. A ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 3 | #P_mulgcl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ N e. ZZ /\ A e. X ) -> ( N .x. A ) e. X ) |
| 16 | 4, 6, 7, 15 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( N .x. A ) e. X ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 3, 12 | #P_oddvds | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( N .x. A ) e. X /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( O ` ( N .x. A ) ) || K <-> ( K .x. ( N .x. A ) ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 18 | 4, 16, 5, 17 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( O ` ( N .x. A ) ) || K <-> ( K .x. ( N .x. A ) ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 19 | 10, 14, 18 | #P_3bitr4rd | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( O ` ( N .x. A ) ) || K <-> ( O ` A ) || ( K x. N ) ) ) |
